ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of the Auditor General of Canada as the auditor of Marine Atlantic Inc.
PrecisOrder appointing the Auditor General of Canada as the AUDITOR of MARINE ATLANTIC INC. for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2022.
